title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1807.1 - Notification of intention to make payments in lieu of taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1807.1 - Notification of intention to make payments in lieu of taxes

State Regulations

Notice of intention to make payments of annual sums in
lieu of taxes shall be given to the commissioner by the agency and his approval
obtained prior to making of any such payments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1807.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
